channel.title: Runescape epidemic! [no more bans, resets!]
channel.description:
WELL, I KNOW MANY PEOPLE ARE GOING TO SAY NO NEED FOR CAPS LOCK, BUT THIS IS A NEED FOR CAPS LOCK! RUNESCAPE STOPPED BANNING ACCOUNTS, INSTEAD THEY ARE NOW ROLLINGBACK ACCOUNTS! YOU WANT PROOF, LOOK AT THIS...
http://services.runescape.com/m=adventurers-log/display_player_profile.ws?searchName=Symzie19&submit=
HE DEFEATED JAD, AND HAD 71 RANGED. BUT NOW LOOK AT HIS STATS. THIS IS HAPPENING TO LOTS OF PEOPLE NOW. WHO IS NEXT?!?!?!?!?!!?!?!?!?!?
JAGEX CAN EASILY FUCK UP YOUR LIFE NOW IF YOU WORKED ON YOUR ACCOUNT FOR A LONG TIME.

item.title: Runescape epidemic! [no more bans, resets!]
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:86, topic:367603”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=463750.msg3415303#msg3415303 date=1290996203]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=463750.msg3415102#msg3415102 date=1290984318]

[quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=463750.msg3415085#msg3415085 date=1290983519]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=463750.msg3413904#msg3413904 date=1290907739]
I am actually going to test this, I am going to have a bot running nonstop wcing and see what happens.
[/quote]Not a good idea, because when the time comes when you want to legit bot jagex will already be watching you.
[/quote]I think he means on a new account.
[/quote]They will still be watching his IP…
[/quote]i don’t think they do that, do they?[/quote]Of course they do, how do you think they catch repeat offenders?

Read full topic

Good idea, me too, except on 2 different accounts. I’m going to use the best woodcutting bot (with chat responder and no missed clicks) vs the worst one (fucks up on randoms, miss clicks, no chat responder) and see which one dont want to finish the sentence its too much work

item.title: Runescape epidemic! [no more bans, resets!]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

What if you bot 99 woodcutting (They probably won’t catch you by then, never happened to me)
Then just have a drop party with your shiny new 30M cash?

You know you’re going to get banned, and throwing away 30M cash is pretty fun
Or you can bot on 3 different accounts on 1 computer (If it’s not a total piece of shit) then at the end of the month (takes 1 month to 99) you can have a 90M drop party.
Jagex can’t take away the money you put in the chest then given away to hundreds of players…

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape epidemic! [no more bans, resets!]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

i have an ax:

I’ve heard of a guy (Scotty Jay) who botted his defence just so they would roll it back, and now he has 10. So he has things like hand cannon, barrows gloves, sw cape, etc. that would normally be impossible to get with 10 defence.

I can tell some ultra pures are going to be botting so they can get there defence set back to 1 and have hand cannons and such

Read full topic
